creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
Cannot sleep well? Suffering from insomnia?

Sleep Monitor focus on recording sleep cycle details to help you understanding your sleep status. Sleep Monitor has a smart alarm clock to remind you sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor offers relax sounds like white noise to help you sleep better.

Use Sleep Monitor to:

❤️- New Feature: Records All Noise During Sleep
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them and find more about your sleep the next morning!

💤- Record Your Sleep Habits
If you drink alcohol, coffee, eating, smoking, doing exercise or have any pathological condition before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep. Select bedtime behavior then tap sleep icon to start the recording.

✍🏻- Track Your Sleep Patterns
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (rapid eye movement) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor will track your sleep pattern quality and duration by the help of phone microphone, accelerometer sensor and output chart report. Get insights into your physical and mental state when sleep.

🌛- Know Your Sleep Quality
Sleep Monitor systematically analyzes your bedtime behavior and sleep pattern quality then generate your sleep core. Get your daily sleep insights and graph analysis and use the data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like smartband or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set alarm for your morning wake up or nap or night bedtime.

🎵- Listen Relaxing & Soothing Music
Listen high quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

🤦‍♂️🤦‍♀️Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who is suffering insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality like sleep disorder, sleep disruption, sleep deprivation.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Charge your phone by the bed as Microphone will consume battery fast when continuous working.

Language Support
English, German, French, Japanese, Chinese, Italian, Korean, Hungarian, Portuguese, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Vietnamese, Arabic, Indonesian, Persian, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Ukrainian, Breton

Subscripe Premium Features
√ Unlock all sleep noise downloading
√ Unlock all sleep music
√ Unlock all sleep records
√ Unlock sleep notes
√ No ads

We are working on to add more useful features and support more languages in coming updates.

Make sure your bedroom quiet, dark, cool. Feel relax before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!
descriptionShort: Track & understand your sleep. Sleep sounds & smart alarm help you sleep better.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Bug fix：shows awake all night on some devices
-UI improvement

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Cycle Track, Analysis, Music

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
🌛How did you sleep last night? Not sleep well or sleep like a top?

Find your sleep secrets with Sleep Monitor ! Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing and soothing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Install Sleep Monitor to:
✍ - New Feature: Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Sore
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. descriptionHtml:
Cannot sleep well? Suffering from insomnia?

If you drink alcohol, coffee, eating, smoking, doing exercise or have any pathological condition before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep. Select bedtime behavior then tap the start sleep icon to start the recording.

✍🏻-  Track Your Sleep Patterns  
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (rapid eye movement, when dream happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes. Sleep Monitor will track your sleep pattern quality and duration by the help of phone microphone, accelerometer sensor and output chart report. Get insights into your physical and mental state when sleeping.

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Cycle Track, Analysis, Music

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
Cannot sleep well? Suffering from insomnia?

Find your sleep secrets with Sleep Monitor ! Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing and soothing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Install Sleep Monitor to:
✍ - New Feature: Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Sore
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like smartband or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen Relaxing & Soothing Music
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality like
sleep deprivation.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, German, French, Japanese, Chinese, Italian, Korean, Hungarian, Portuguese, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Vietnamese, Arabic, Indonesian, Persian, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Ukrainian, Breton, Danish, Slovak

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records in the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server side for later checking.

🔐 Upgrade to Sleep Monitor Pro to Enjoy ALL Advanced Features
√ Download sleep noise audio files
√ Unlock all sleep music
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock sleep notes
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

We are working to add more useful features and support more languages in coming updates.

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Cycle Track, Analysis, Music

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
Cannot sleep well? Suffering from insomnia?

Find your sleep secrets with Sleep Monitor ! Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing and soothing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Install Sleep Monitor to:
✍ - New Feature: Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Sore
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like smartband or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen Relaxing & Soothing Music
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality like
sleep deprivation.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, German, French, Japanese, Chinese, Italian, Korean, Hungarian, Portuguese, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Vietnamese, Arabic, Indonesian, Persian, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Ukrainian, Breton, Danish, Slovak

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records in the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server side for later checking.

🔐 Upgrade to Sleep Monitor Pro to Enjoy ALL Advanced Features
√ Download sleep noise audio files
√ Unlock all sleep music
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock sleep notes
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

We are working to add more useful features and support more languages in coming updates.

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
Cannot sleep well? Suffering from insomnia?

Sleep Monitor focuses on recording sleep cycle details to help you understand your sleep status. Sleep Monitor has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor offers relaxing sounds like white noise to help you sleep better.

Use Sleep Monitor to:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

❤️- Records All Noise During Sleep  
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning!

💤-  Record Your Sleep Habits  
If you drink alcohol, coffee, eating, smoking, doing exercise, or have any pathological condition before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep. Select bedtime behavior then taps the start sleep icon to start the recording.

✍🏻-  Track Your Sleep Patterns  
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (rapid eye movement, when dream happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes. Sleep Monitor will track your sleep pattern quality and duration with the help of a phone microphone, accelerometer sensor, and output chart report. Get insights into your physical and mental state when sleeping.

🌛- Know Your Sleep Quality  
Sleep Monitor systematically analyzes your bedtime behavior and sleep pattern quality then generates your sleep core. Get your daily sleep insights and graph analysis and use the data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock  
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or night bedtime.

🎵- Listen Relaxing & Soothing Music  
Listen to high quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

🤦‍♂️🤦‍♀️Sleep Monitor Target Group  
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to self-diagnose whether there are signs of poor sleep quality like sleep disruption.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲 App Working Requirements  
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Keep enough battery (more than 60%)

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

Subscribe Premium Features
√ Unlock all sleep noise downloading
√ Unlock all sleep music
√ Unlock all sleep records
√ No ads

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Cycle Track, Analysis, Music

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
How did you sleep last night? 🌛

Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Key Features:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.

√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Cycle Track, Analysis, Music

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
How did you sleep last night? 🌛

Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Key Features:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Tracker

creator: Sleep Health Apps
descriptionHtml:
🌜Enjoy better sleep with Sleep Monitor app!

Sleep Monitor helps you track sleep cycle duration, record snores/dream talks, analyze sleep patterns, and generate statistics to improve sleep quality. Sleep Monitor also has a timer to remind you to sleep early at night and a smart alarm to wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing sleep sounds to help you fall asleep faster.

Prime Features:
1️⃣📲Sleeping Tracker
Track and record sleeping activities when your head hits your pillow. App will monitor and analyze the time you spent on different sleep stages then generate clear graphics from a scientific perspective. Usually, you will experience 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night and pass 4 sleep stages in each sleep cycle:
Stage 1: Awake to light asleep
Stage 2: Light sleep, heart rate slows and body temperature drops
Stage 3: Deep sleep, muscles and tissues repair
Stage 4: REM, body is paralyzed and dream begin

2️⃣🎙Snore/Sleep Talking Recorder
Record snoring/ dream talking/coughing/teeth grinding/other noises made during daytime nap or night sleep with advanced AI-powered sound classification. This insight is extremely helpful for detecting sleep apnea, which can help guide a treatment plan.

3️⃣🎶Sleep Aid
Suffering from insomnia? App provides two ways to help you sleep soundly:
- Breathing exercise: help you focus your energy and calm down to feel relaxed quickly by doing deep breathing exercises
- Sleep sounds: mindful meditation and relaxing music(raining, campfire, forest, ASMR, brainwave, white noise, soothing lullabies) to help manage your sleep, stress and anxiety, calm your racing mind before sleep.

4️⃣🕙 Bedtime Reminder
- Set a consistent sleep schedule to go to bed at the same time

5️⃣⏰Smart Alarm Clock
Always wake up sleepy? An intelligent alarm clock that wakes you up refreshed in your lightest sleep phase with gentle nature sound (birds, sea, wind...) volume increasing. Good morning brings you a good mood for the whole day.

6️⃣💯Sleep Score
Provide complete evaluation of your sleep quality made of: sleep time, regularity, efficiency, sleep phases, snoring. Lower score number means poor sleep quality, which need your attention to improve.

7️⃣ 📊Sleep Trends
Calculate your weekly, monthly and yearly trends of sleep regularity, debt and surplus, sleep goal, and awake activities and analyze those details to improve sleep.

8️⃣🥇8. Sleep Challenge
Create healthy sleep habits by joining 21-day sleep challenge. Get better sleep and be more productive and rise energy day by day.

9️⃣✍Sleep Notes
Your personal sleep diary

🔟💤Sleep Factors
If you drink, eat, exercise, or have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

⏳Coming Features
More functions are under development: family plan, galaxy watch support, Google Fit support, heart rate detection...

App Target Group
√ Users who care about sleep quality and want to improve
√ Users who suffer from insomnia (sleep disorder )
√ Users who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of snoring, sleep apnea, or sickness
√ Users who want to record snore/dream talk sounds
Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in a wearable accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

💡App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android device near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure device battery is enough

Enjoy Sleep Monitor Premium
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Save recorded audio files
√ Backup sleep records on Cloud
√ Unlock all sleep sounds, sleep trends, and sleep notes
√ Ads free

FAQ: http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, and cool. Feel relaxed.
Hope you sleep well like a baby!🌛

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Tracker

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
How did you sleep last night? 🌛

Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Key Features:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure the battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records on the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server-side for later checking.

🔐 Enjoy Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Download audio recordings
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock all sleep music, sleep notes, sleep trends
√ No ads

Key Features:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure the battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records on the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server-side for later checking.

🔐 Enjoy Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Download audio recordings
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock all sleep music, sleep notes, sleep trends
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!
descriptionShort: Tracking and recording sleep. Understand your sleep cycles and keep healthy.

3. Other changes

Wish you will enjoy all the features in Sleep Monitor: Sleep cycle tracking, snore/dream talk recording, calming& relaxing sleep sounds, and the smart alarm to wake you up in the lightest sleep phase.

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Tracker

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
As-tu bien dormi la nuit dernière? 🌛

Sleep Monitor vous aide à suivre et à enregistrer les détails du cycle de sommeil. Sleep Monitor dispose également d'un réveil intelligent pour vous rappeler de dormir tôt le soir et de vous réveiller en douceur le matin. De plus, Sleep Monitor propose une musique relaxante pour vous aider à mieux dormir.

Principales caractéristiques:
📊- Nouveau: Tendances du sommeil
Améliorez la qualité du sommeil et développez de meilleures habitudes de sommeil grâce à des statistiques de données hebdomadaires et mensuelles.

🎙- Enregistrer les sons
Sleep Monitor enregistrera les ronflements, les conversations de rêve ou les grincements de dents émis pendant votre sommeil, les écoutera et en découvrira plus sur votre sommeil le lendemain matin! Pour s'amuser!

💤- Marquer les habitudes de sommeil
Si vous buvez, mangez, faites de l'exercice, avez une condition pathologique ou des émotions dépressives avant de dormir, voyez comment ces habitudes de sommeil peuvent avoir un impact sur votre sommeil.

📲- Suivi des cycles de sommeil
Les dormeurs auront 4 ou 5 cycles de sommeil pendant la nuit. Habituellement, les dormeurs passent quatre étapes de sommeil en un cycle de sommeil: Non-REM 1 (entre le réveil et le sommeil), Non-REM 2 (sommeil léger), Non-REM 3 (sommeil profond) et REM (Rapid Eye Movement, quand la plupart des rêves se produisent) dormir. Ces étapes progressent cycliquement de 1 à REM puis recommencent avec l'étape 1.

Sleep Monitor utilise à la fois des capteurs de microphone et d'accélérateur pour mesurer les mouvements du corps et les changements de bruit ambiant, puis vous aider à reconnaître vos étapes de sommeil.
Sleep Monitor est particulièrement utile pour ceux qui veulent un moyen de vérifier leur sommeil et ne veulent pas investir dans un accessoire comme un bracelet intelligent ou une montre intelligente.

⏰ - Réveil intelligent
Réglez une alarme pour votre réveil ou sieste le matin ou définissez un rappel pour l'heure du coucher.

🎵- Berceuses apaisantes
Écoutez de la musique relaxante de haute qualité pour calmer un esprit de course avant de dormir. Endormez-vous rapidement avec différents types de sons de sommeil.

✍ - Notes de sommeil
Prenez de brèves notes pour votre sommeil. Écrivez tout ce que vous voulez pour ne jamais les oublier.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 Groupe cible
- Les personnes souffrant d'insomnie, un trouble du sommeil qui se caractérise par des difficultés à s'endormir et / ou à rester endormi.
- Les personnes qui veulent faire un autodiagnostic s'il y a des signes de mauvaise qualité du sommeil.
- Des personnes soucieuses de la qualité du sommeil

📲 Configuration requise pour l'application
√ Placez votre téléphone Android près de votre oreiller ou de votre lit
√ Dormez seul pour éliminer les interférences
√ Assurez-vous que la batterie est suffisante

📝 À propos de la sauvegarde des enregistrements de sommeil
Les utilisateurs de la version gratuite peuvent enregistrer les 7 derniers enregistrements de sommeil sur le téléphone; Les utilisateurs de la version Pro peuvent enregistrer jusqu'à 30 derniers enregistrements de sommeil du côté de l'application et sauvegarder tous les enregistrements d'historique sur le stockage Cloud.

🔐 Profitez de Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Personnalisez les facteurs de sommeil
√ Télécharger des enregistrements audio
√ Enregistrez 30 et sauvegardez tous les enregistrements de sommeil
√ Débloquez toute la musique de sommeil, les notes de sommeil, les tendances de sommeil
√ Aucune publicité

❤️ FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Assurez-vous que votre chambre est calme, sombre et fraîche. Sentez-vous détendu avant de dormir.
J'espère que vous dormez comme un bébé!
descriptionShort: Suivez, enregistrez et analysez le sommeil.

1. Improved sleep tracking page
2. Improved UE
3. Other changes

Si vous buvez, mangez, faites de l'exercice, avez une condition pathologique ou des émotions dépressives avant de dormir, voyez comment ces habitudes de sommeil peuvent avoir un impact sur votre sommeil.

📲- Suivi des cycles de sommeil
Les dormeurs auront 4 ou 5 cycles de sommeil pendant la nuit. Habituellement, les dormeurs passent quatre étapes de sommeil en un cycle de sommeil: Non-REM 1 (entre le réveil et le sommeil), Non-REM 2 (sommeil léger), Non-REM 3 (sommeil profond) et REM (Rapid Eye Movement, quand la plupart des rêves se produisent) dormir. Ces étapes progressent cycliquement de 1 à REM puis recommencent avec l'étape 1.

Sleep Monitor utilise à la fois des capteurs de microphone et d'accélérateur pour mesurer les mouvements du corps et les changements de bruit ambiant, puis vous aider à reconnaître vos étapes de sommeil.
Sleep Monitor est particulièrement utile pour ceux qui veulent un moyen de vérifier leur sommeil et ne veulent pas investir dans un accessoire comme un bracelet intelligent ou une montre intelligente.

⏰ - Réveil intelligent
Réglez une alarme pour votre réveil ou sieste le matin ou définissez un rappel pour l'heure du coucher.

🎵- Berceuses apaisantes
Écoutez de la musique relaxante de haute qualité pour calmer un esprit de course avant de dormir. Endormez-vous rapidement avec différents types de sons de sommeil.

✍ - Notes de sommeil
Prenez de brèves notes pour votre sommeil. Écrivez tout ce que vous voulez pour ne jamais les oublier.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 Groupe cible
- Les personnes souffrant d'insomnie, un trouble du sommeil qui se caractérise par des difficultés à s'endormir et / ou à rester endormi.
- Les personnes qui veulent faire un autodiagnostic s'il y a des signes de mauvaise qualité du sommeil.
- Des personnes soucieuses de la qualité du sommeil

📲 Configuration requise pour l'application
√ Placez votre téléphone Android près de votre oreiller ou de votre lit
√ Dormez seul pour éliminer les interférences
√ Assurez-vous que la batterie est suffisante

📝 À propos de la sauvegarde des enregistrements de sommeil
Les utilisateurs de la version gratuite peuvent enregistrer les 7 derniers enregistrements de sommeil sur le téléphone; Les utilisateurs de la version Pro peuvent enregistrer jusqu'à 30 derniers enregistrements de sommeil du côté de l'application et sauvegarder tous les enregistrements d'historique sur le stockage Cloud.

🔐 Profitez de Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Personnalisez les facteurs de sommeil
√ Télécharger des enregistrements audio
√ Enregistrez 30 et sauvegardez tous les enregistrements de sommeil
√ Débloquez toute la musique de sommeil, les notes de sommeil, les tendances de sommeil
√ Aucune publicité

❤️ FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Assurez-vous que votre chambre est calme, sombre et fraîche. Sentez-vous détendu avant de dormir.
J'espère que vous dormez comme un bébé!
descriptionShort: Suivez, enregistrez et analysez le sommeil.

title: Sleep Monitor - Sommeil Suivi

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
How did you sleep last night? 🌛

Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Key Features:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure the battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records on the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server-side for later checking.

🔐 Enjoy Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Download audio recordings
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock all sleep music, sleep notes, sleep trends
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!
descriptionShort: Tracking and recording sleep. Understand your sleep cycles and keep healthy.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure the battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records on the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server-side for later checking.

🔐 Enjoy Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Download audio recordings
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock all sleep music, sleep notes, sleep trends
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Tracker

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
As-tu bien dormi la nuit dernière? 🌛

Sleep Monitor vous aide à suivre et à enregistrer les détails du cycle de sommeil. Sleep Monitor dispose également d'un réveil intelligent pour vous rappeler de dormir tôt le soir et de vous réveiller en douceur le matin. De plus, Sleep Monitor propose une musique relaxante pour vous aider à mieux dormir.

Principales caractéristiques:
📊- Nouveau: Tendances du sommeil
Améliorez la qualité du sommeil et développez de meilleures habitudes de sommeil grâce à des statistiques de données hebdomadaires et mensuelles.

🎙- Enregistrer les sons
Sleep Monitor enregistrera les ronflements, les conversations de rêve ou les grincements de dents émis pendant votre sommeil, les écoutera et en découvrira plus sur votre sommeil le lendemain matin! Pour s'amuser!

💤- Marquer les habitudes de sommeil
Si vous buvez, mangez, faites de l'exercice, avez une condition pathologique ou des émotions dépressives avant de dormir, voyez comment ces habitudes de sommeil peuvent avoir un impact sur votre sommeil.

📲- Suivi des cycles de sommeil
Les dormeurs auront 4 ou 5 cycles de sommeil pendant la nuit. Habituellement, les dormeurs passent quatre étapes de sommeil en un cycle de sommeil: Non-REM 1 (entre le réveil et le sommeil), Non-REM 2 (sommeil léger), Non-REM 3 (sommeil profond) et REM (Rapid Eye Movement, quand la plupart des rêves se produisent) dormir. Ces étapes progressent cycliquement de 1 à REM puis recommencent avec l'étape 1.

Sleep Monitor utilise à la fois des capteurs de microphone et d'accélérateur pour mesurer les mouvements du corps et les changements de bruit ambiant, puis vous aider à reconnaître vos étapes de sommeil.
Sleep Monitor est particulièrement utile pour ceux qui veulent un moyen de vérifier leur sommeil et ne veulent pas investir dans un accessoire comme un bracelet intelligent ou une montre intelligente.

⏰ - Réveil intelligent
Réglez une alarme pour votre réveil ou sieste le matin ou définissez un rappel pour l'heure du coucher.

🎵- Berceuses apaisantes
Écoutez de la musique relaxante de haute qualité pour calmer un esprit de course avant de dormir. Endormez-vous rapidement avec différents types de sons de sommeil.

✍ - Notes de sommeil
Prenez de brèves notes pour votre sommeil. Écrivez tout ce que vous voulez pour ne jamais les oublier.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 Groupe cible
- Les personnes souffrant d'insomnie, un trouble du sommeil qui se caractérise par des difficultés à s'endormir et / ou à rester endormi.
- Les personnes qui veulent faire un autodiagnostic s'il y a des signes de mauvaise qualité du sommeil.
- Des personnes soucieuses de la qualité du sommeil

📲 Configuration requise pour l'application
√ Placez votre téléphone Android près de votre oreiller ou de votre lit
√ Dormez seul pour éliminer les interférences
√ Assurez-vous que la batterie est suffisante

📝 À propos de la sauvegarde des enregistrements de sommeil
Les utilisateurs de la version gratuite peuvent enregistrer les 7 derniers enregistrements de sommeil sur le téléphone; Les utilisateurs de la version Pro peuvent enregistrer jusqu'à 30 derniers enregistrements de sommeil du côté de l'application et sauvegarder tous les enregistrements d'historique sur le stockage Cloud.

🔐 Profitez de Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Personnalisez les facteurs de sommeil
√ Télécharger des enregistrements audio
√ Enregistrez 30 et sauvegardez tous les enregistrements de sommeil
√ Débloquez toute la musique de sommeil, les notes de sommeil, les tendances de sommeil
√ Aucune publicité

❤️ FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Assurez-vous que votre chambre est calme, sombre et fraîche. Sentez-vous détendu avant de dormir.
J'espère que vous dormez comme un bébé!
descriptionShort: Suivez, enregistrez et analysez le sommeil.

These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure the battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records on the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server-side for later checking.

🔐 Enjoy Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Download audio recordings
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock all sleep music, sleep notes, sleep trends
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Tracker

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
As-tu bien dormi la nuit dernière? 🌛

Sleep Monitor vous aide à suivre et à enregistrer les détails du cycle de sommeil. Sleep Monitor dispose également d'un réveil intelligent pour vous rappeler de dormir tôt le soir et de vous réveiller en douceur le matin. De plus, Sleep Monitor propose une musique relaxante pour vous aider à mieux dormir.

Principales caractéristiques:
📊- Nouveau: Tendances du sommeil
Améliorez la qualité du sommeil et développez de meilleures habitudes de sommeil grâce à des statistiques de données hebdomadaires et mensuelles.

🎙- Enregistrer les sons
Sleep Monitor enregistrera les ronflements, les conversations de rêve ou les grincements de dents émis pendant votre sommeil, les écoutera et en découvrira plus sur votre sommeil le lendemain matin! Pour s'amuser!

💤- Marquer les habitudes de sommeil
Si vous buvez, mangez, faites de l'exercice, avez une condition pathologique ou des émotions dépressives avant de dormir, voyez comment ces habitudes de sommeil peuvent avoir un impact sur votre sommeil.

📲- Suivi des cycles de sommeil
Les dormeurs auront 4 ou 5 cycles de sommeil pendant la nuit. Habituellement, les dormeurs passent quatre étapes de sommeil en un cycle de sommeil: Non-REM 1 (entre le réveil et le sommeil), Non-REM 2 (sommeil léger), Non-REM 3 (sommeil profond) et REM (Rapid Eye Movement, quand la plupart des rêves se produisent) dormir. Ces étapes progressent cycliquement de 1 à REM puis recommencent avec l'étape 1.

Sleep Monitor utilise à la fois des capteurs de microphone et d'accélérateur pour mesurer les mouvements du corps et les changements de bruit ambiant, puis vous aider à reconnaître vos étapes de sommeil.
Sleep Monitor est particulièrement utile pour ceux qui veulent un moyen de vérifier leur sommeil et ne veulent pas investir dans un accessoire comme un bracelet intelligent ou une montre intelligente.

⏰ - Réveil intelligent
Réglez une alarme pour votre réveil ou sieste le matin ou définissez un rappel pour l'heure du coucher.

🎵- Berceuses apaisantes
Écoutez de la musique relaxante de haute qualité pour calmer un esprit de course avant de dormir. Endormez-vous rapidement avec différents types de sons de sommeil.

✍ - Notes de sommeil
Prenez de brèves notes pour votre sommeil. Écrivez tout ce que vous voulez pour ne jamais les oublier.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 Groupe cible
- Les personnes souffrant d'insomnie, un trouble du sommeil qui se caractérise par des difficultés à s'endormir et / ou à rester endormi.
- Les personnes qui veulent faire un autodiagnostic s'il y a des signes de mauvaise qualité du sommeil.
- Des personnes soucieuses de la qualité du sommeil

📲 Configuration requise pour l'application
√ Placez votre téléphone Android près de votre oreiller ou de votre lit
√ Dormez seul pour éliminer les interférences
√ Assurez-vous que la batterie est suffisante

📝 À propos de la sauvegarde des enregistrements de sommeil
Les utilisateurs de la version gratuite peuvent enregistrer les 7 derniers enregistrements de sommeil sur le téléphone; Les utilisateurs de la version Pro peuvent enregistrer jusqu'à 30 derniers enregistrements de sommeil du côté de l'application et sauvegarder tous les enregistrements d'historique sur le stockage Cloud.

🔐 Profitez de Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Personnalisez les facteurs de sommeil
√ Télécharger des enregistrements audio
√ Enregistrez 30 et sauvegardez tous les enregistrements de sommeil
√ Débloquez toute la musique de sommeil, les notes de sommeil, les tendances de sommeil
√ Aucune publicité

❤️ FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Assurez-vous que votre chambre est calme, sombre et fraîche. Sentez-vous détendu avant de dormir.
J'espère que vous dormez comme un bébé!
descriptionShort: Suivez, enregistrez et analysez le sommeil.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Add sound mix feature: you could create your own sleep sounds based on your own taste. Try it on Sounds page
2. Update recorded noise recognition mechanism: noises are labeled more accurately
3. Other optimizations

Sleep Monitor enregistrera les ronflements, les conversations de rêve ou les grincements de dents émis pendant votre sommeil, les écoutera et en découvrira plus sur votre sommeil le lendemain matin! Pour s'amuser!

💤- Marquer les habitudes de sommeil
Si vous buvez, mangez, faites de l'exercice, avez une condition pathologique ou des émotions dépressives avant de dormir, voyez comment ces habitudes de sommeil peuvent avoir un impact sur votre sommeil.

📲- Suivi des cycles de sommeil
Les dormeurs auront 4 ou 5 cycles de sommeil pendant la nuit. Habituellement, les dormeurs passent quatre étapes de sommeil en un cycle de sommeil: Non-REM 1 (entre le réveil et le sommeil), Non-REM 2 (sommeil léger), Non-REM 3 (sommeil profond) et REM (Rapid Eye Movement, quand la plupart des rêves se produisent) dormir. Ces étapes progressent cycliquement de 1 à REM puis recommencent avec l'étape 1.

Sleep Monitor utilise à la fois des capteurs de microphone et d'accélérateur pour mesurer les mouvements du corps et les changements de bruit ambiant, puis vous aider à reconnaître vos étapes de sommeil.
Sleep Monitor est particulièrement utile pour ceux qui veulent un moyen de vérifier leur sommeil et ne veulent pas investir dans un accessoire comme un bracelet intelligent ou une montre intelligente.

⏰ - Réveil intelligent
Réglez une alarme pour votre réveil ou sieste le matin ou définissez un rappel pour l'heure du coucher.

🎵- Berceuses apaisantes
Écoutez de la musique relaxante de haute qualité pour calmer un esprit de course avant de dormir. Endormez-vous rapidement avec différents types de sons de sommeil.

✍ - Notes de sommeil
Prenez de brèves notes pour votre sommeil. Écrivez tout ce que vous voulez pour ne jamais les oublier.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 Groupe cible
- Les personnes souffrant d'insomnie, un trouble du sommeil qui se caractérise par des difficultés à s'endormir et / ou à rester endormi.
- Les personnes qui veulent faire un autodiagnostic s'il y a des signes de mauvaise qualité du sommeil.
- Des personnes soucieuses de la qualité du sommeil

📲 Configuration requise pour l'application
√ Placez votre téléphone Android près de votre oreiller ou de votre lit
√ Dormez seul pour éliminer les interférences
√ Assurez-vous que la batterie est suffisante

📝 À propos de la sauvegarde des enregistrements de sommeil
Les utilisateurs de la version gratuite peuvent enregistrer les 7 derniers enregistrements de sommeil sur le téléphone; Les utilisateurs de la version Pro peuvent enregistrer jusqu'à 30 derniers enregistrements de sommeil du côté de l'application et sauvegarder tous les enregistrements d'historique sur le stockage Cloud.

🔐 Profitez de Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Personnalisez les facteurs de sommeil
√ Télécharger des enregistrements audio
√ Enregistrez 30 et sauvegardez tous les enregistrements de sommeil
√ Débloquez toute la musique de sommeil, les notes de sommeil, les tendances de sommeil
√ Aucune publicité

❤️ FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Assurez-vous que votre chambre est calme, sombre et fraîche. Sentez-vous détendu avant de dormir.
J'espère que vous dormez comme un bébé!
descriptionShort: Suivez, enregistrez et analysez le sommeil.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Improved REM feature: more accurate now
2. Calculated total snoring time during your sleep
3. Fixed the issue deep and light sleep not showing correct
4. Fixed crash issues and improved app stability

title: Sleep Monitor - Sommeil Suivi

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
How did you sleep last night? 🌛

Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Key Features:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure the battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records on the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server-side for later checking.

🔐 Enjoy Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Download audio recordings
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock all sleep music, sleep notes, sleep trends
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!
descriptionShort: Tracking and recording sleep. Understand your sleep cycles and keep healthy.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Improved REM feature: more accurate now
2. Calculated total snoring time during your sleep
3. Fixed the issue deep and light sleep not showing correct
4. Fixed crash issues and improved app stability

title: Sleep Monitor - Sommeil Suivi

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
How did you sleep last night? 🌛

Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Key Features:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure the battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records on the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server-side for later checking.

🔐 Enjoy Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Download audio recordings
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock all sleep music, sleep notes, sleep trends
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!
descriptionShort: Tracking and recording sleep. Understand your sleep cycles and keep healthy.

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Tracker

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
As-tu bien dormi la nuit dernière? 🌛

Sleep Monitor vous aide à suivre et à enregistrer les détails du cycle de sommeil. Sleep Monitor dispose également d'un réveil intelligent pour vous rappeler de dormir tôt le soir et de vous réveiller en douceur le matin. De plus, Sleep Monitor propose une musique relaxante pour vous aider à mieux dormir.

Principales caractéristiques:
📊- Nouveau: Tendances du sommeil
Améliorez la qualité du sommeil et développez de meilleures habitudes de sommeil grâce à des statistiques de données hebdomadaires et mensuelles.

🎙- Enregistrer les sons
Sleep Monitor enregistrera les ronflements, les conversations de rêve ou les grincements de dents émis pendant votre sommeil, les écoutera et en découvrira plus sur votre sommeil le lendemain matin! Pour s'amuser!

💤- Marquer les habitudes de sommeil
Si vous buvez, mangez, faites de l'exercice, avez une condition pathologique ou des émotions dépressives avant de dormir, voyez comment ces habitudes de sommeil peuvent avoir un impact sur votre sommeil.

📲- Suivi des cycles de sommeil
Les dormeurs auront 4 ou 5 cycles de sommeil pendant la nuit. Habituellement, les dormeurs passent quatre étapes de sommeil en un cycle de sommeil: Non-REM 1 (entre le réveil et le sommeil), Non-REM 2 (sommeil léger), Non-REM 3 (sommeil profond) et REM (Rapid Eye Movement, quand la plupart des rêves se produisent) dormir. Ces étapes progressent cycliquement de 1 à REM puis recommencent avec l'étape 1.

Sleep Monitor utilise à la fois des capteurs de microphone et d'accélérateur pour mesurer les mouvements du corps et les changements de bruit ambiant, puis vous aider à reconnaître vos étapes de sommeil.
Sleep Monitor est particulièrement utile pour ceux qui veulent un moyen de vérifier leur sommeil et ne veulent pas investir dans un accessoire comme un bracelet intelligent ou une montre intelligente.

⏰ - Réveil intelligent
Réglez une alarme pour votre réveil ou sieste le matin ou définissez un rappel pour l'heure du coucher.

🎵- Berceuses apaisantes
Écoutez de la musique relaxante de haute qualité pour calmer un esprit de course avant de dormir. Endormez-vous rapidement avec différents types de sons de sommeil.

✍ - Notes de sommeil
Prenez de brèves notes pour votre sommeil. Écrivez tout ce que vous voulez pour ne jamais les oublier.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 Groupe cible
- Les personnes souffrant d'insomnie, un trouble du sommeil qui se caractérise par des difficultés à s'endormir et / ou à rester endormi.
- Les personnes qui veulent faire un autodiagnostic s'il y a des signes de mauvaise qualité du sommeil.
- Des personnes soucieuses de la qualité du sommeil

📲 Configuration requise pour l'application
√ Placez votre téléphone Android près de votre oreiller ou de votre lit
√ Dormez seul pour éliminer les interférences
√ Assurez-vous que la batterie est suffisante

📝 À propos de la sauvegarde des enregistrements de sommeil
Les utilisateurs de la version gratuite peuvent enregistrer les 7 derniers enregistrements de sommeil sur le téléphone; Les utilisateurs de la version Pro peuvent enregistrer jusqu'à 30 derniers enregistrements de sommeil du côté de l'application et sauvegarder tous les enregistrements d'historique sur le stockage Cloud.

🔐 Profitez de Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Personnalisez les facteurs de sommeil
√ Télécharger des enregistrements audio
√ Enregistrez 30 et sauvegardez tous les enregistrements de sommeil
√ Débloquez toute la musique de sommeil, les notes de sommeil, les tendances de sommeil
√ Aucune publicité

❤️ FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Assurez-vous que votre chambre est calme, sombre et fraîche. Sentez-vous détendu avant de dormir.
J'espère que vous dormez comme un bébé!
descriptionShort: Suivez, enregistrez et analysez le sommeil.

title: Sleep Monitor - Sommeil Suivi

creator: SM Health Team
descriptionHtml:
How did you sleep last night? 🌛

Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Key Features:
📊- New Feature: Sleep Trends
Improve sleep quality and develop better sleep habits with weekly and monthly data statistics.

🎙- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them, and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

💤- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

📲- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually, sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.

Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.

📈- Get Your Sleep Score
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly, or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like a smart band or smartwatch.

⏰ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake-up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

🎵- Listen to Soothing Lullabies
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high-quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

✍ - Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering from insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality

📲App Working Requirements
√ Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
√ Sleep alone to eliminate interference
√ Make sure the battery is enough

🏳️‍🌈Language Support
English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Italian, Hungarian, Slovak, Greek, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Danish, Romanian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, Breton, Lithuanian, Chinese, Indonesian, Vietnamese

📝 About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records on the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server-side for later checking.

🔐 Enjoy Sleep Monitor Pro
√ Customize sleep factors
√ Download audio recordings
√ Save 30 and backup all sleep records
√ Unlock all sleep music, sleep notes, sleep trends
√ No ads

❤️FAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.
Hope you sleep like a baby!
descriptionShort: Tracking and recording sleep. Understand your sleep cycles and keep healthy.
